song_name: Zelda II - The Adventure of Link - Village
metrics_conclusion: Zelda II - The Adventure of Link - Village has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Zelda II - The Adventure of Link - Village is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
